trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides a lazy indirect reference to an object and its associated metadata for use by the Managed Extensibility Framework.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx x xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xx xxx Xxxxxxx Xxxxxxxxxxxxx Xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The metadata associated with the referenced object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x
